TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GrammarBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供以程式設計的方式建置語音辨識文法條件約束的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for programmatically building the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別的執行個體也可以取得自其他類別的隱含轉換，或結合物件與第二個物件以從新。Instances of this class can also be obtained by implicit conversions from other classes or by combining a object with a second object to from a new . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For more information, see the and methods. 若要加入至現有的條件約束，使用， ， ， ，和方法，而運算子。To add constraints to an existing , use the , , , , and methods, and the operator. > [!IMPORTANT] > 語音辨識器在使用語音辨識文法包含相同的索引鍵名稱重複語意的項目或多個語意的項目可以重複修改相同的語意元素的值時，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 如需有關建立和使用語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 語音辨識](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)並[建立 GrammarBuilder 文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態方法會提供另一種機制，供您可以結合各種類型建立多樣性和文法的彈性建置時。The static methods provide another mechanism by which you can combine various types to create diversity and flexibility in grammars built with . 這些方法會對應至靜態方法，也會定義於類別。These methods correspond to the static methods, which are also defined on the class. 參數的順序會決定項目的順序，在新。The order of the parameters determines the order of the elements in the new . A也可從取得， ， ，並[字串](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733)物件。A can also be obtained from , , , and [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733) objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和運算子。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 語音辨識器在使用語音辨識文法包含相同的索引鍵名稱重複語意的項目或多個語意的項目可以重複修改相同的語意元素的值時，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 如需有關建立和使用語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 語音辨識](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)並[建立 GrammarBuilder 文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援從下列類別的隱含轉換： supports implicit conversions from the following classes: - - - - 這個方法會接受如上面所列的物件`builder`參數。This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和運算子。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您合併並包含物件或執行個體，請確定您有避免建立重複的語意項目具有相同索引鍵的名稱或多個語意的項目可以重複修改屬性物件。When you combine and objects that contain or instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the property of a object. 語音辨識器在遇到這些情況下，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[新增至 GrammarBuilder 文法的語意](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Add Semantics to a GrammarBuilder Grammar](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx).

summary.span: 將文法項目附加至目前的文法項目序列。

span.span: Appends a grammar element to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這些方法來附加至現有的文法項目。Use these methods to append grammar elements to an existing . 當您建立文法項目時，您可以將它們附加至現有的產生器，以漸進方式開發 語音辨識文法的條件約束。As you create grammar elements, you can append them to the existing builder to progressively develop the constraints for a speech recognition grammar. 每個項目會加入至目前的項目序列的結尾。Each element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements. 此方法有附加的多載， ， ， ，和物件。This method has overloads for appending , , , , and objects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 語音辨識器在使用語音辨識文法包含相同的索引鍵名稱重複語意的項目或多個語意的項目可以重複修改相同的語意元素的值時，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 如需有關建立和使用語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 語音辨識](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)並[建立 GrammarBuilder 文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

summary.span: 將文法檔案或文法規則附加至目前的文法項目序列。

span.span: Appends a grammar file or a grammar rule to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以附加的文法檔案或文法規則從檔案。The methods can append a grammar file or a grammar rule from a file. 這些方法可讓應用程式，使使用預先部署或公開可用的文法規則進行剖析。These methods allow applications to make use of pre-deployed or publicly available grammar rules. 應用程式必須具有讀取權限，以指定的文法檔案的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 這些方法可以讀取下列格式的語音辨識文法。These methods can read a speech recognition grammar from the following formats. - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 符合 Microsoft 語音辨識文法二進位格式 （.cfg 副檔名） 的二進位檔Binary files that conform to the Microsoft Speech Recognition Grammar Binary Format (.cfg file extension) 編譯的 XML 格式 SRGS 文法檔案，以具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位文法檔案可以減少時間供搜尋的相符項目，特別是當文法需要大量的單字和片語辨識。Compiling an XML-format SRGS grammar file to a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension can reduce the time consumed by searches for a match, especially if the grammar requires recognition of a large number of words and phrases. 如需編譯成 CFG 二進位格式的 SRGS 文法的詳細資訊，請參閱。For information about compiling SRGS grammars to the CFG binary format, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendRuleReference (string path);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendRuleReference(string path) cil managed
Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 檔案的路徑或通用資源識別項 (URI)，這個檔案以支援的格式來描述語音辨識文法。

span.span: The path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

summary.span: 將文法定義檔附加至目前的文法項目序列。

span.span: Appends a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所提供的 URI`path`引數可以是本機或遠端。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 應用程式必須具有讀取權限，以指定的文法檔案的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. W3C 語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 表示法可以定義根規則。A W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) representation can define a root rule. 這個方法會附加文法中，從其根規則，到目前的文法項目序列。This method appends the grammar, beginning with its root rule, to the current sequence of grammar elements. 若要將附加特定的文法規則，請使用方法。To append a specific grammar rule, use the method. ## Examples 下列 C# 範例會建立名為的規則會使用語音辨識文法`Cities`在本機的 SRGS 檔案中，cities.grxml。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. Cities.grxml 檔案的內容會出現下列 C# 程式碼範例。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar1() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.AppendRuleReference("file://c:/temp/cities.grxml"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 1"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendRuleReference (string path, string rule);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendRuleReference(string path, string rule) cil managed
Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String, rule As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ rule);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string * string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 檔案的檔案路徑或通用資源識別項 (URI)，這個檔案以支援的格式來描述語音辨識文法。

span.span: The file path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

param.name: rule
param.span: 要附加之規則的識別項，若要附加文法檔案的預設根規則則為 。

span.span: The identifier of the rule to append, or to append the default root rule of the grammar file.

summary.span: 將指定的文法定義檔規則附加至目前的文法項目序列。

span.span: Appends the specified rule of a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所提供的 URI`path`引數可以是本機或遠端。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 應用程式必須具有讀取權限，以指定的文法檔案的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 您可以使用使用附加以其根規則的文法檔案開頭的方法。You can use the use the method to append a grammar file beginning with its root rule. ## Examples 下列 C# 範例會建立名為的規則會使用語音辨識文法`Cities`在本機的 SRGS 檔案中，cities.grxml。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. Cities.grxml 檔案的內容會出現下列 C# 程式碼範例。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar2() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.Append("Does"); builder.AppendRuleReference(@"c:\temp\cities.grxml", "Cities"); builder.Append("have a shuttle"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

summary.span: 建立新的，其對應至兩個文法項目的序列。

span.span: Creates a new that corresponds to a sequence of two grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算元的順序決定項目的順序，在新。The order of the operands determines the order of the elements in the new . > [!IMPORTANT] > 注意： 建議您在合併時或是包含的物件或與其他的文法項目執行個體。Caution is recommended when combining or objects that contain or instances with other grammar elements. 語音辨識器在使用語音辨識文法包含相同的索引鍵名稱重複語意的項目或多個語意的項目可以重複修改相同的語意元素的值時，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 如需有關建立和使用語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 語音辨識](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)並[建立 GrammarBuilder 文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援從下列類別的轉換。 supports conversions from the following classes. - - - - 這個方法會接受如上面所列的物件`builder`參數。This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱運算子。For more information, see the operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您合併並包含物件或執行個體，請確定您有避免建立重複的語意項目具有相同索引鍵的名稱或多個語意的項目可以重複修改屬性物件。When you combine and objects that contain or instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the property of a object. 語音辨識器在遇到這些情況下，可以擲回例外狀況。The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances. 如需有關如何建置包含語意資訊的語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱[了解 SemanticResultValue 和 SemanticResultKey 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is
